snippet.title: Highline Volleyball VR Game Update 1
snippet.description:
We are thrilled to share the gameplay trailer for the first milestone of the early access of Highline Volleyball VR.

Discover the new location Eden Rock, and Alice our new volleyball player.
Hitting the ball with closed fist, underhand service and blocking at the net are now possible.

You can already enjoy the game on Steam and Early Access is discounted 25% from the full release price.

►Visit our Steam Store Page :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1852940?utm_source=youtubechan
►Follow us on Twitter for latest news about the game :
https://twitter.com/pdiumsuperint
►Official game website :
https://www.highlinevolleyballgame.com

An indie VR (Virtual Reality) Volleyball videogame releasing on Steam soon. Add us to your wishlist on Steam for supporting our game and be informed of the official release date of the Early Access.

Early access is benefiting a 25 % discount from the full price to thank the community for it's financial support.

If the game is successfull enough we plan to add a multiplayer mode, so please definitely support us during early access.

Playing Volleyball at any time from your house, thanks to virtual reality.
Subscribe our channel to stay informed on the evolution of the game.

Trailer music is part of the game and licensed with Jamendo :
Live Life - James Stefano By MonkeyMan
Future Bass - AlexiAction
Modern Asia - AlexiAction
